[[tab 実績]]
[[module CSS]]

/* Grid layout */

#page-content .left-grid {
    float: left;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}
#page-content .right-grid {
    float: right;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}

/* Mobile Media Query */
@media (max-width: 479px) { 
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Note Media Query */
@media (min-width: 480px) and (max-width: 580px) { 
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Tablet Media Query */
@media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 979px) {
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

[[/module]]
= 参考: [[[hal-aki-achievement-badges|]]] by [[user hal_aki]] and [[user tsucchii0301]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_参加表明.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**参加表明**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**サイトへの参加を承認される**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]

[[/div]]

[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**秘密の実験室**[[/span]][[/size]]

[[/div]]

[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**三人寄れば**[[/span]][[/size]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]

[[size 85%]]**記事を作成する**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_採用通知.png width="50"]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]

[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**ミスター・ほんやく**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**海外記事を10以上翻訳する**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_とってもエキサイト.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**とってもエキサイト**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**海外記事を20以上翻訳する**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_週刊誌.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**週刊誌**[[/span]][[/size]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_バイリンガル.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**バイリンガル**[[/span]][[/size]]

[[/div]]
